subject: Shipping problem
description_text:
Hi my name is jordan and I placed an order back on June 7th and I got a
confirmation email and a tracking number. According to FedEx the shipment
was created then canceled by the sender but I received an email on Friday
June 13th from Simsonn saying the shipment was on its way. It is now
Saturday June 21st and I have still not received the shipment and it was
supposed to arrive within 3-7 business days. I would just like some help on
finding out where the package may be or if it ever got shipped out, it
would be much appreciated.

conversations.body_text: Hi Jordan Hobson,  Please provide your order number so we can check the shipping status for you.

Order number is  SSN1686.

On Sat, Jun 21, 2025 at 10:02 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Jordan Hobson,    Your logistics single number has been updated and is expected to be delivered in the next two days: 881973614281
